Texts.Chs: 我们正在逐步停止使用这项任务。请不要担心这个任务是否已经完成或者放弃。
Texts.Eng: We are phasing out the usage of this quest. Please do not worry if it has been completed/abandoned.

Texts.Chs:
欢迎更新RPGrowth到1.31！

这个任务是一个指示器，表明附近的玩家会得到相同数量的XP。现在那些近战职业不会拾取你的那份了。
Texts.Eng:
Welcome to Update 1.31 of RPG Growth!

This quest is an indicator that nearby players will gain the same amount of XP you do, and vice versa. Now those pesky Melee-Only Classes won't steal all of it from you.
